Example #1

$('#test1').nutritionLabel({
	allowFDARounding : true,
	showPolyFat : true,
	showMonoFat : true,

	valueCalories : 57.3254,
	valueFatCalories : 73.3254,
	valueTotalFat : 6.3254,
	valueSatFat : 9.3254,

	valuePolyFat : 11.3254,
	valueMonoFat : 13.5254,

	valueTransFat : 7.5254,
	valueCholesterol : 16.3254,
	valueSodium : 156.3254,

	valueTotalCarb : 3.3254,
	valueFibers : 4.5254,
	valueSugars : 5.5254,
	valueProteins : 6.3254,

	valueVitaminA : 53.3254,
	valueVitaminC : 56.3254,
	valueCalcium : 66.3254,
	valueIron : 73.3254,

	valuePotassium_2018 : 0.3254,
	valueAddedSugars : 0.3254,
	valueSugarAlcohol : 0.3254,
	valueVitaminD : 0.3254
});


Example #2

$('#test2').nutritionLabel({
	allowFDARounding : true,
	showPolyFat : true,
	showMonoFat : true,

	valueCalories : 42.3254,
	valueFatCalories : 46.3254,
	valueTotalFat : 4.3254,
	valueSatFat : 2.8254,

	valuePolyFat : 4.3254,
	valueMonoFat : 2.5654,

	valueTransFat : 3.5254,
	valueCholesterol : 4.3254,
	valueSodium : 56.3254,

	valueTotalCarb : 0.6254,
	valueFibers : 0.7254,
	valueSugars : 0.8254,
	valueProteins : 0.9254,

	valueVitaminA : 33.3254,
	valueVitaminC : 46.3254,
	valueCalcium : 16.3254,
	valueIron : 23.3254,

	valuePotassium_2018 : 0.3254,
	valueAddedSugars : 0.3254,
	valueSugarAlcohol : 0.3254,

});


Example #3

$('#test3').nutritionLabel({
	allowFDARounding : true,
	showPolyFat : true,
	showMonoFat : true,

	valueCalories : 4.3254,
	valueFatCalories : 3.3254,
	valueTotalFat : 0.3254,
	valueSatFat : 0.4254,

	valuePolyFat : 0.3254,
	valueMonoFat : 0.1654,

	valueTransFat : 0.4254,
	valueCholesterol : 1.3254,
	valueSodium : 4.3254,

	valueTotalCarb : 0.4254,
	valueFibers : 0.3254,
	valueSugars : 0.3254,
	valueProteins : 0.4670820615186001,

	valueVitaminA : 9.3254,
	valueVitaminC : 7.3254,
	valueCalcium : 3.3254,
	valueIron : 1.3254,

	valuePotassium_2018 : 0.3254,
	valueAddedSugars : 0.3254,
	valueSugarAlcohol : 0.3254,
	valueVitaminD : 0.3254
});
